What Happened: Plantation; FL-based BroadSpire appointed Ryan Garver as Vice President of Technology.
About Person: Ryan Garver was previously the CTO at ELC Technologies.
About Company: Broadspire; a Platinum Equity company and third-party administrator; offers a broad array of customized casualty; medical management and integrated disability management services designed to increase employee productivity and contain costs.
